title: /home问题

txt_content:

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 你这个是跨世界传送的权限问题 你输入 /mangaddp essentials.worlds.Existence builder

replies.author: Ir.Nep
replies.txt_content: 将这个权限加入权限组中咯

replies.author: jajamu
replies.txt_content: 先查询默认用户组是哪个，再输入/mangaddi 默认用户组 builder
